reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Girls' Empowerment for Meaningful Participation and Education (GEMPE)

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to empower girls and young women, to strengthen their skills to make informed decisions and choices in life, and to increase their decision-making power in education, sexuality, sexual and reproductive rights and health issues. In addition, the project aims at eliminating harmful traditional and cultural practices in communities, as these prevent the full realization of rights of girls. The project also aims at strengthening the skills of community and district level stakeholders a nd those responsible for guaranteeing girls rights, support for school attendance and inclusive education. The target group is 3 000 girls and 600 boys, and the first phase of the project continues until the end of 2020. Capacity-building of the implementi ng organization Center for Youth Empowerment and Civic Education (CYECE) is one of the main objectives of the project. The cooperation was initiated in 2017 through an open call for tenders and the project implementation started in March 2018. https://www. cyecemalawi.org/
